attributes.action: make banks provide free insurance to pay loans and mortgages if made redundant
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Considering the bulk of redundacies created in the current climate are a knock on effect of the incompetence of the banking sector, why should those on the receiving end have to pay banks again for a safe-guard when losing their job when it is the action of these institutions which have caused the issue in the first place.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
